com.ami.mse.ucms.tasks

Class TaskBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ami.mse.ucms.tasks.TaskBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Named(value="taskBean")
@ViewAccessScoped
public class TaskBean
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Contains methods for processing instances of Assignment and Comments.
    Author:
    Tony
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaskBean

        public TaskBean()

    • Method Detail

      • onCreateTaskLoad

        public void onCreateTaskLoad()
        Called when the page for the create of the new task is opened. Extracts the user that is logged

      • editPageLoad

        public void editPageLoad(com.ami.mse.ucms.db.entities.tasks.Assignment assignment)
        Called when the edit page for the task is opened. Makes currentAssignment to be assignment chosen by the user. Fill commentList with comments that are for the current assignment that will be edited. Redirect to edit-task page.
        Parameters:
        assignment - - assignment that is chosen by the user in the table in view-tasks-by-me page

      • workPageLoad

        public void workPageLoad(com.ami.mse.ucms.db.entities.tasks.Assignment assignment)
        Called when view-task page is loaded. Makes current assignment the assignment that the user is chosen from the table in the view-tasks-to-me page. Extracts all comments on the current assignment and pass them to commentList, witch will be shown by table. Redirect to view-task page.
        Parameters:
        assignment - - assignment that is chosen by the user in the table in view-tasks-to-me page

      • save

        public String save()
        Save the instance of Assignment. Checks if currentAssignment is null. If it is then make new instance and saves it, if it isn't edit the existing one. Sets message for success to save the task and redirect to the view-task-by-me when the user editing the assignment.
        Returns:
        if current assignment is edited redirect to view-tasks-by-me page or if it isn't refreshes the create-task page

      • saveWork

        public void saveWork()
        Sets comments to the current assignment and update that assignment, when user update the status of the assignment that is assign to him.

      • setCommentsToAssignment

        public void setCommentsToAssignment()
        Sets all comments to the currentAssignment. Sets Comments user and docAssignment if they are null.

      • saveComments

        public void saveComments()
        Saves object of type Comments and fill list of comments witch is used to assign comments to different tasks. This method fills part of the comments properties, other (docAssignment and user) are updated later when the task got saved.

      • findStatuses

        public List<com.ami.mse.ucms.db.entities.tasks.AssignmentStatus> findStatuses()
        Extracts statuses that can be assigned for the task from.
        Returns:
        the list of AssignmentStatus

      • transformStatuses

        public String transformStatuses(com.ami.mse.ucms.db.entities.tasks.AssignmentStatus assignmentStatus)
        Transforms the AssignmentStatus values to string representation on BG language. Used in task-by-me and task-to-me pages.
        Parameters:
        assignmentStatus - the status that will be transformed
        Returns:
        string representation of the assignment statuses in BG language or null if the status isn't one of the AssignmentStatus
